thig7.3:5.2: When you’re born, you get to enjoy sensual pleasures.
thig7.3:5.3: Enjoy the delights of sensual pleasure;
thig7.3:6.1: “Death comes to those who are born;
thig7.3:6.2: and when born they fall into suffering:
thig7.3:6.3: the chopping off of hands and feet,
thig7.3:7.1: But there is one born in the Sakyan clan,
thig7.3:8.4: that leads to the stilling of suffering.
thig7.3:10.1: Relishing is destroyed in every respect,
thig7.3:10.2: and the mass of darkness is shattered.
thig7.3:12.1: The Book of the Sevens is finished.
